author: kpedro88
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is part of #43695. It does two major things:
1. Adds `cmsTritonConfigTool`, a general tool to inspect and edit config.pbtxt files. This tool has some specific modes:
    * `threadcontrol` to handle editing config files for the local fallback server, which was previously done (much less robustly) using `cat`
    * `checksum` to check and inject model checksums for versioning
    * `versioncheck` that runs `checksum` over all `config.pbtxt` files in `$CMSSW_SEARCH_PATH`
2. Updates `TritonClient` to compare model checksums between the local model version (which is known to be the right one) and the remote model version on the server.
3. Adds a unit test to run `cmsTritonConfigTool versioncheck` whenever any cms-data contents are modified.

This PR is kept in draft mode until the other parts of #43695 are complete, otherwise workflows will fail in the meantime.

#### PR validation:

Tested SONIC workflows with this code in place and model checksums in config.pbtxt files, and everything runs correctly. Also tested with a wrong checksum to see that the exception is thrown.

New unit test passes with cms-data update PRs included (see #43695) and fails as expected otherwise.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Not planned to be backported.
title: Triton model versioning
